titleStmt.title: Wadlington v. Commonwealth of Kentucky, Application for Appeal

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

body.p:
Waddlington
v } application for appeal.
Com'th

"A Party is not bound to state what he is about to prove by a witness whom he offers. And if a competent witness is offered, it is error to reject him, and ground for reversal, although it do not appear whether his testimony would have been material or not"
